analysis.description:
MiniMeToken.balances (/unique_chucks/8/0x439b54caf661c21e6b231d972d7eaa98f199590f.sol#120-121) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- doTransfer (/unique_chucks/8/0x439b54caf661c21e6b231d972d7eaa98f199590f.sol#218-254)
	- balanceOfAt (/unique_chucks/8/0x439b54caf661c21e6b231d972d7eaa98f199590f.sol#334-356)
	- generateTokens (/unique_chucks/8/0x439b54caf661c21e6b231d972d7eaa98f199590f.sol#427-442)
	- destroyTokens (/unique_chucks/8/0x439b54caf661c21e6b231d972d7eaa98f199590f.sol#446-463)

TokenSale.totalVested (/unique_chucks/8/0x439b54caf661c21e6b231d972d7eaa98f199590f.sol#798-799) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- handleExternalBuyers (/unique_chucks/8/0x439b54caf661c21e6b231d972d7eaa98f199590f.sol#924-948)
	- doPayment (/unique_chucks/8/0x439b54caf661c21e6b231d972d7eaa98f199590f.sol#957-997)
	- finalizeSale (/unique_chucks/8/0x439b54caf661c21e6b231d972d7eaa98f199590f.sol#1009-1028)
MiniMeToken.isContract (/unique_chucks/8/0x439b54caf661c21e6b231d972d7eaa98f199590f.sol#527-531) is declared view but contains assembly code

Reentrancy in MiniMeToken.approve (/unique_chucks/8/0x439b54caf661c21e6b231d972d7eaa98f199590f.sol#267-285):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(TokenController(controller).onApprove(msg.sender,_spender,_amount)) (/unique_chucks/8/0x439b54caf661c21e6b231d972d7eaa98f199590f.sol#282-283)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- allowed (/unique_chucks/8/0x439b54caf661c21e6b231d972d7eaa98f199590f.sol#284)

Reentrancy in TokenSale.finalizeSale (/unique_chucks/8/0x439b54caf661c21e6b231d972d7eaa98f199590f.sol#1009-1028):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(tokenContract.generateTokens(vaultAddress,leftoverTokens)) (/unique_chucks/8/0x439b54caf661c21e6b231d972d7eaa98f199590f.sol)
	- require(bool)(tokenContract.generateTokens(address(this),lockedTokens.add(totalVested))) (/unique_chucks/8/0x439b54caf661c21e6b231d972d7eaa98f199590f.sol)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- finalized (/unique_chucks/8/0x439b54caf661c21e6b231d972d7eaa98f199590f.sol)

MiniMeToken.claimTokens (/unique_chucks/8/0x439b54caf661c21e6b231d972d7eaa98f199590f.sol#558-573) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(controller,balance) (/unique_chucks/8/0x439b54caf661c21e6b231d972d7eaa98f199590f.sol#570-573)

TokenSale.handleExternalBuyers (/unique_chucks/8/0x439b54caf661c21e6b231d972d7eaa98f199590f.sol#924-948) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-totalVested.add(_locked[i]) (/unique_chucks/8/0x439b54caf661c21e6b231d972d7eaa98f199590f.sol#943)

MiniMeToken.getValueAt.min (local variable @ /unique_chucks/8/0x439b54caf661c21e6b231d972d7eaa98f199590f.sol#494) shadows:
	- MiniMeToken.min (function @ /unique_chucks/8/0x439b54caf661c21e6b231d972d7eaa98f199590f.sol#535-538)

TokenSale.handleEarlySaleBuyers has external calls inside a loop:
	- require(bool)(tokenContract.generateTokens(_recipients[i],tokensToIssue)) (/unique_chucks/8/0x439b54caf661c21e6b231d972d7eaa98f199590f.sol#921-922)

TokenSale.handleExternalBuyers has external calls inside a loop:
	- require(bool)(tokenContract.generateTokens(_recipients[i],_free[i])) (/unique_chucks/8/0x439b54caf661c21e6b231d972d7eaa98f199590f.sol#939-940)

Reentrancy in TokenSale.doPayment (/unique_chucks/8/0x439b54caf661c21e6b231d972d7eaa98f199590f.sol#957-997):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(tokenContract.controller() == address(this)) (/unique_chucks/8/0x439b54caf661c21e6b231d972d7eaa98f199590f.sol#963-964)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- totalIssued (/unique_chucks/8/0x439b54caf661c21e6b231d972d7eaa98f199590f.sol#989-991)

Reentrancy in TokenSale.handleExternalBuyers (/unique_chucks/8/0x439b54caf661c21e6b231d972d7eaa98f199590f.sol#924-948):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(tokenContract.generateTokens(_recipients[i],_free[i])) (/unique_chucks/8/0x439b54caf661c21e6b231d972d7eaa98f199590f.sol#939-940)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- vestedAllowances (/unique_chucks/8/0x439b54caf661c21e6b231d972d7eaa98f199590f.sol#941-943)

MiniMeToken.isContract uses assembly (/unique_chucks/8/0x439b54caf661c21e6b231d972d7eaa98f199590f.sol#527-531)
	- /unique_chucks/8/0x439b54caf661c21e6b231d972d7eaa98f199590f.sol#529-531
